30 namespace ttl_driver

32 
36 class MockStepperDriver : public AbstractStepperDriver
37 {
38  public:
39  MockStepperDriver(std::shared_ptr<FakeTtlData> data);
40 
41  std::string str() const override;
42 
43  // AbstractTtlDriver interface : we cannot define them globally in AbstractTtlDriver
44  // as it is needed here for polymorphism (AbstractTtlDriver cannot be a template class and does not
45  // have access to reg_type). So it seems like a duplicate of DxlDriver
46  public:
47  int ping(uint8_t id) override;
48  int getModelNumber(uint8_t id,
49  uint16_t& model_number) override;
50  int scan(std::vector<uint8_t>& id_list) override;
51  int reboot(uint8_t id) override;
52 
53  // eeprom write
54  int changeId(uint8_t id, uint8_t new_id) override;
55 
56  // eeprom read
57  int checkModelNumber(uint8_t id) override;
58  int readFirmwareVersion(uint8_t id, std::string &version) override;
59  int readMinPosition(uint8_t id, uint32_t &min_pos) override;
60  int readMaxPosition(uint8_t id, uint32_t &max_pos) override;
61 
62  // ram write
63  int writeTorquePercentage(uint8_t id, uint8_t torque_percentage) override;
64  int writePositionGoal(uint8_t id, uint32_t position) override;
65  int writeVelocityGoal(uint8_t id, uint32_t velocity) override;
66 
67  int syncWriteTorquePercentage(const std::vector<uint8_t> &id_list, const std::vector<uint8_t> &torque_percentage_list) override;
68  int syncWritePositionGoal(const std::vector<uint8_t> &id_list, const std::vector<uint32_t> &position_list) override;
69  int syncWriteVelocityGoal(const std::vector<uint8_t> &id_list, const std::vector<uint32_t> &velocity_list) override;
70 
71  // ram read
72 
73  int readTemperature(uint8_t id, uint8_t& temperature) override;
74  int readVoltage(uint8_t id, double &voltage) override;
75  int readHwErrorStatus(uint8_t id, uint8_t& hardware_error_status) override;
76 
77  int readPosition(uint8_t id, uint32_t &present_position) override;
78  int readVelocity(uint8_t id, uint32_t &present_velocity) override;
79 
80  int syncReadPosition(const std::vector<uint8_t> &id_list, std::vector<uint32_t> &position_list) override;
81  int syncReadVelocity(const std::vector<uint8_t> &id_list, std::vector<uint32_t> &velocity_list) override;
82  int syncReadJointStatus(const std::vector<uint8_t> &id_list, std::vector<std::array<uint32_t, 2> >& data_array) override;
83 
84  int syncReadFirmwareVersion(const std::vector<uint8_t> &id_list, std::vector<std::string> &firmware_list) override;
85  int syncReadTemperature(const std::vector<uint8_t> &id_list, std::vector<uint8_t>& temperature_list) override;
86  int syncReadVoltage(const std::vector<uint8_t> &id_list, std::vector<double> &voltage_list) override;
87  int syncReadRawVoltage(const std::vector<uint8_t> &id_list, std::vector<double> &voltage_list) override;
88  int syncReadHwStatus(const std::vector<uint8_t> &id_list, std::vector<std::pair<double, uint8_t> >& data_list) override;
89 
90  int syncReadHwErrorStatus(const std::vector<uint8_t> &id_list, std::vector<uint8_t> &hw_error_list) override;
91 
92  // AbstractStepperDriver interface
93  public:
94  int readControlMode(uint8_t id, uint8_t &mode) override;
95  int writeControlMode(uint8_t id, uint8_t mode) override;
96 
97  int readVelocityProfile(uint8_t id, std::vector<uint32_t>& data_list) override;
98  int writeVelocityProfile(uint8_t id, const std::vector<uint32_t>& data) override;
99 
100  int startHoming(uint8_t id) override;
101  int writeHomingSetup(uint8_t id, uint8_t direction, uint8_t stall_threshold) override;
102 
103  int readHomingStatus(uint8_t id, uint8_t &status) override;
104  int syncReadHomingStatus(const std::vector<uint8_t> &id_list, std::vector<uint8_t> &status_list) override;
105 
106  int readFirmwareRunning(uint8_t id, bool &is_running) override;
107 
108  int syncReadHomingAbsPosition(const std::vector<uint8_t> &id_list, std::vector<uint32_t> &abs_position) override;
109  int syncWriteHomingAbsPosition(const std::vector<uint8_t> &id_list, const std::vector<uint32_t> &abs_position) override;
110 
111  float velocityUnit() const override;
112 
113  private:
114  bool init();
115 
116  std::shared_ptr<FakeTtlData> _fake_data;
117  std::vector<uint8_t> _id_list;
118 
119  uint8_t _calibration_status{CALIBRATION_IDLE};
120  // fake time for calibration
121  int _fake_time{0};
122 
123  static constexpr int GROUP_SYNC_REDONDANT_ID = 10;
124  static constexpr int LEN_ID_DATA_NOT_SAME = 20;
125 
126  static constexpr int CALIBRATION_IDLE = 0;
127  static constexpr int CALIBRATION_IN_PROGRESS = 1;
128  static constexpr int CALIBRATION_SUCCESS = 2;
129  static constexpr int CALIBRATION_ERROR = 3;
130 
131 
132 };
133 
134 }
